games.title: Sprout
games.description: Made in 72 hours with only one other game developer, and featured at Toronto FanExpo 2024! In Sprout, players take on the role of a character with the unique ability to toggle between a giant and a tiny form. Embark on a whimsical platforming adventure as Sprout navigates through vibrant and challenging levels, using his size-changing powers to overcome obstacles!

games.title: Gravity Gone
games.description: Using Unreal Engine's Blueprints and various free 3D art assets, I developed a puzzle game and simulated a gravity gun that assists players in their escape from an ominous, cave. The game features cinematics that provides hints and players with an immersive experience.

games.title: 7 Nights of Halloween
games.description: I participated in the 3 day Cozy Fall Game Jam as the Project Manager, Programmer, and Level Designer of 7 Nights of Halloween, an adventure game made with Unity. During this time, I coordinated a team of 8 game developers to prepare a 2.5D web game.
